post.text: Why do Trump and Putin keep saying all the same things?

comment.author: Kimberly
comment.text: Putin is a cut throat, dictator with no ethics and will use all necessary means to quell dissent while also using clever methods to propagate his PR ( See the RT channel). However abhorrent, Putin is, he does have a high IQ and is pretty intelligent, speaks measuredly and has cultivated his tough guy image through action. Trump, on the other hand is just a Chump, born with a silver spoon. End of story!!!

replies.author: Taelor
replies.text: He was not hillary has no good policies more taxes more musslims no boarders taking donations from iran and giving money to isis , she is corrupt and she should not be aloud to run...

replies.text: Trump in the Dumps. CHECK OUT GOVERNOR GARY JOHNSON/ GOVERNOR BILL WELD !! #neverhillary , did you know Gary climbed Mount Everest
